generalComments1: generalComments are to tell the developer about some things in this file, and are not referenced in the game logic.
generalComments2: usedOn.objectUseWith1 can be another object or the screenId that an exit leads to
generalComments3: usedOn.useTogetherLocation can be a screenId or an object/npc if two elements can be used together anywhere, but they must both point to each other for this to work.
generalComments4: Doors: alreadyUsed will map to whether or not a locked door is opened.  False, the door is locked, True, it is unlocked, and this should always match the status field in the navigation screen for the exit
generalComments5: Doors: activeStatus refers to whether the state of the door is open or closed, and does not relate to whether it is locked. true is open, false is closed
generalComments6: canHover: Can be set to false and will stop user hovering and interacting for example object in canvas but invisible until they push something or look at something etc, can make not hoverable and add a blank png and replace it when it should become visible
generalComments7: name property of an object cannot have its last word as the same as another objects name ie one object is hook you can not use rope and hook, and check other languages too

objectBarrelBarn.comment: Barrel in Barn that you can open

objectBone.comment: Dog's bone, it is revealed when player gives dog objectMilkInBowl

objectBowl.comment: Bowl to combine with Milk Bottle, for giving to Dog

objectCarrot.comment: Give carrot to donkey in order to show objectDonkeyRope and move the donkey so can access barn

objectCrowbar.comment: Crowbar for breaking in to house placed in den

objectDonkeyFake.comment: Object instance of Donkey npc that can be used to show the rope, the space after the name is important or the code wont work

objectDonkeyRope.comment: Key for unlocking door to researchRoom from libraryFoyer

name.es: Puerta de Salida de la Biblioteca
name.fr: Porte de Sortie de la Bibliothèque

objectDoorLibraryFoyerMarketStreet.comment: door from libraryFoyer to marketStreet, can be opened and closed from the start

objectDoorLibraryFoyerResearchRoom.comment: door from libraryFoyer to researchRoom, opened by using objectKeyResearchRoom on it

objectDoorToDen.comment: door from seedyGuyAlley to Den opens when objectKeyToDen used on it

objectIllegibleMap.comment: Key for unlocking door to researchRoom from libraryFoyer

name.es: Llave para la sala de investigación
name.it: Chiave per la sala di ricerca
name.fr: Clé pour la salle de recherche

objectKeyResearchRoom.comment: Key for unlocking door to researchRoom from libraryFoyer

objectKeyToDen.comment: Key for unlocking door to den from seedyGuyAlley

objectMallet.comment: Mallet for repairing bridge with nails

objectMilkBottle.comment: Key for unlocking door to researchRoom from libraryFoyer

objectMilkInBowl.comment: Give this to dog and it will drop its bone

objectNails.comment: Nails to use on bridge with Mallet

objectPaperWithInstructionsScrawledOn.comment: A clue for the player for repairing the bridge

name.en: Useless Flyer For Closed Down Bird Park
name.es: Folleto inútil del parque de aves cerrado
name.it: Volantino inutile per il parco ornitologico chiuso
name.fr: Flyer inutile pour un parc d'oiseaux fermé

objectParrotFlyer.comment: place over top of mirror and show when user takes mirror

objectParrotHook.comment: Hook for attaching parrotFlyer and can also be taken after this puzzle finishes and used with Rope

objectParrotMirror.comment: Give to npcWomanLostMirror to get objectKeyToDen

objectPileOfBooksLibraryFoyer.comment: Pile of books you use or push or pull to get the key for the research room

objectPitchFork.comment: Key for unlocking door to researchRoom from libraryFoyer

objectPliers.comment: Pliers for getting splinter from cow

objectPulleyWheel.comment: Pulley for combining with sturdy anchor at river crossing

objectRopeAndHook.comment: Combined result of objectParrotHook and objectDonkeyRope used with Pulley once its on the branch at riverCrossing

objectSplinter.comment: Splinter stuck in cows foot that will jam the pulley wheel

name.en: Pulley With Splinter Jammed In It

objectSplinterJammedInPulley.comment: Combined pulley wheel and splinter for jamming wood when hoisted

objectSturdyAnchor.comment: Anchor for attaching pulley wheel to on river crossing tree
